about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the mesmerizing world of Flat&fluffy , where captivating jigsaw puzzle mechanics meet an eclectic collection of over 100 stunning images featuring furry, sci-fi, fantasy, monster and goth girls.



Featuring a diverse array of themes and characters, Flat&fluffy offers a unique and engaging puzzle experience unlike any other. Piece together intricate scenes of fantastical realms, futuristic landscapes, and mysterious gothic settings, each more enchanting than the last.



Unlock your full potential with our progression and unlocking system, rewarding your dedication with access to new images and challenges. As you progress, unlock access to our gallery, where you can admire your completed masterpieces at your leisure.



Game features:

  • over 100 images
  • relaxing audio track
  • Progression and a HINT system to help you when you are stuck
  • Gallery - easy access to completed puzzles



Whether you're a puzzle enthusiast, a fan of furry, sci-fi, or gothic aesthetics, or simply seeking a moment of calm in a hectic world, Flat&fluffy offers something for everyone. Get ready to embark on a puzzling adventure like no other. Are you ready to piece together the mysteries that await?

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of genitalia and sexual acts like masturbation or blowjobs.

name: Flat&Fluffy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor (i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB of Video Ram
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
